Erie.Gannon University Stadium:
Gannon University Stadium, also known as Gannon Field, is a 2,500-seat multi-purpose stadium in Erie, Pennsylvania, United States on the campus of Gannon University.


== Overview ==
The artificial surface field is used by several Gannon University sports teams, including: football, soccer, baseball and softball. Movable stands provide for a maximum seating of 2,500 spectators.
